concept.definition: A safety incident, reaction, medication error, or other untoward medical event affecting a patient
A safety event that almost happened, but was noticed and prevented in time to prevent harm from occurring to the patient
Any unsafe condition that poses a elevated risk to patient safety

description: Value Set for QICore Adverse Event Type Codes (Preferred)

text.div:
QICore Adverse Event Type Codes

Value Set for QICore Adverse Event Type Codes (Preferred)

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/qicore-adverseevent-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
incident IncidentA safety incident, reaction, medication error, or other untoward medical event affecting a patient
near-miss Near MissA safety event that almost happened, but was noticed and prevented in time to prevent harm from occurring to the patient
unsafe Unsafe ConditionAny unsafe condition that poses a elevated risk to patient safety
